project.title: Histera
project.description: Histera is a rapid fire multiplayer shooter featuring dynamic deathmatch arenas that transform as you fight!

project.title: Last Resort
project.description: Last Resort is an online co-op base defense shooter with roguelike elements.

project.title: Refense
project.description: Refense is a 2D Action game, in which you have to reflect enemy projectiles back at them in order to increase your highscore.

project.title: Crowd King
project.description: Crowd King is a top down platformer where you have to get through the level collecting as many minions as you can.

project.title: Empires
project.description: Empires is a RTS Game set in space, that was created for the Raspberry Pi.

project.title: DIY Hero
project.description: DIY Hero is a top down game, in which you play a little boy having to fight vegtables.

project.title: TetrisAI
project.description: I used genetic algorithms to teach my AI how to play Tetris.

project.title: AmpleEngine
project.description: As a school project I had to create an engine and create a Megaman x2 clone with it.

project.title: RayTracer
project.description: In the first year of university, we had to create a (non-realtime) Ray Tracer that can handle reflection and refraction.

project.title: HammerFly
project.description: Hammer Fly is a mobile app that I created as a personal project.

project.title: PortfolioWebsite
project.description: I created this Portfolio Website myself from Scratch using vanilla HTML, CSS and JS. Github Link.

project.title: PythonWebscraper
project.description: I created a Python Webscraper, to get game stats from my friends and me to display on our Website. Github Link.

project.title: IMDB Extension
project.description: I created a small Chrome Extension that displays the average rating an actor or actress has on shows during their careers.

project.title: Happits
project.description: I created a small Android app to track and establish productive habits.
